Sentence.value: For example, find out if your hospital has: - A floor or unit that does only the type of surgery you are having (For example, for hip replacement surgery, do they have a floor or unit that is used only for joint-replacement surgeries?)
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: For example, find out if your hospital has: - A floor or unit that does only the type of surgery you are having (For example, for [[hip replacement|C0392806]] [[surgery|C0543467]], do they have a floor or unit that is used only for [[joint-replacement|C0185317]] [[surgeries|C0543467]]?)

Sentence.value: - Operating rooms that are used only for your type of surgery - Specific guidelines so that everyone who has your type of surgery receives the kind of care they need - Enough nurses It can also be helpful to know how many surgeries like yours have been done at the hospital you have chosen or are considering for your surgery.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - Operating rooms that are used only for your type of surgery - Specific guidelines so that everyone who has your type of surgery receives the kind of care they need - Enough nurses It can also be helpful to know how many [[surgeries|C0543467]] like yours have been done at the hospital you have chosen or are considering for your [[surgery|C0543467]].
